summary: This document is a Yahoo! account management record for the email address littlestjeff@yahoo.com, which is associated with Jeffrey Epstein. It shows account creation details, an alternate email address, and Epstein's personal address in New York.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: The Yahoo! account 'littlestjeff@yahoo.com' is registered under his name and lists his address at 457 Madison Ave, New York.

locations: 457 Madison Ave, New York, NY 10019, United States
keyFacts: Jeffrey Epstein used the Yahoo! email address 'littlestjeff@yahoo.com'.
The account was created on February 6, 2000.
An alternate, unverified communication channel listed is 'jeevacation@gmail.com'.
The account registration is linked to Epstein's New York address at 457 Madison Ave.
The document is marked as 'CONFIDENTIAL' and bears SDNY and EFTA case file numbers.
